School abjuration [chaotic]; Level antipaladin 3, cleric/oracle 3, inquisitor 3, medium 3, occultist 3, shaman 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, spiritualist 3, summoner 3, unchained Summoner 3; Domain Chaos 3;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S, M/DF (a 3-ft.-diameter circle of powdered silver)

Range touch
Area 10-ft.-radius emanation from touched creature
Duration 10 min./level
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless); Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions like magic circle against evil, except that it is similar to Protection from Law instead of Protection from Evil, and it can imprison a nonchaotic called creature.

data.shortDescription: This spell functions like magic circle against evil, except that it is similar to Protection from Law instead of Protection from Evil, and it can imprison a nonchaotic called creature.
